question: The police of this city are planning to use Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs) to enhance women safety.
explanation: To enhance women's safety in the megapolis, Mumbai police are planning to use Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs) for surveillance and install 'panic buttons' across the city. The measures are part of a Rs 252-crore Safe City Project, which will be implemented fully in three years. The use of UAVs for women's safety will be the first in the country.
